phrases: Something does not feel right about this...
Is this as far as it goes for Fairy Tail B team and Laxus's tale of triumph?!
He is showing such great strength.
And yet I am not sensing much magic power.
Perhaps it means he is not going all out yet?
The impression I got of him from you is totally different, Happy.
He does have a connection with that guild's master, so maybe it is making him hesitant.
Made up of Wizards who are masters at all of the Fairy Tail members' weaknesses.
And the four of us are the guild's elite.
Do you intend to go to war with us?
We know every detail of your weaknesses.
Shall I release the power that my guild has been accumulating these past seven years?
Gramps has already done a thorough investigation of you.
Do I have to say it again?
The number of members, your guild's location, funding...
We know everything that is been going on these seven years.
He seemed like a nasty fellow, and I guess that impression was correct.
Then he was a double agent?
He does not seem to be one for fine details, but it backfired on us.
Why is he having a tough time?!
What, does he have a cold?!
Are those bastards talkin' trash about me?
I already have info on my foolish son and his wizards,
but I do not have a precise report yet on some of them.
I have no information on his existence, let alone his background.
Considering all of our secrets have been leaked, he has not really had any reaction.
Even though Gramps knew all that, he did not make a move on you.
Are you sure it is okay to let them be?
You said my old man had information that could be damaging to Fairy Tail.
Seven years have passed since then.
During those seven years, there is been no sign any of that info has leaked.
You cannot be sure of that.
They are well aware of how dangerous that information could be if it gets out.
You are better off not knowing.
Every guild has their forbidden secrets.
I have heard that in these seven years,
Ivan has not been up to any mischief or done anything to harm our members.
As long as he does not make a move, I have no intention of stirring anything up either.
Because you are father and son...
I have been waiting all this time for this day!
It was all to get Lumen Histoire!
I did your guild no harm for seven years?
There is no way the dregs you left behind had any information on that!
Inside your guild, Magnolia, Tenroujima, too!
I searched every place associated with your guild!
But I still did not find anything!
You are my son, are not you?!
Even if it is for the sake of family,
the guild cannot stand by if the lives of its members are threatened.
That is how the previous master protected this guild, too.
It is our place to go home to!
I thought you were standing there a little too quietly...
You were taking measure of my magic, were you?
That part of you never changes.
Or is it just that you cannot bring yourself to hit your father?
You are such a nice boy, Laxus-chan.
Now, unleash the power of the anti-Fairy Tail guild!
Is this the guy who attacked Wendy and Carla?!
I do not know what it is you are after,
but you are going to pay for hurting my comrades!
You would hit your own father?!
Laxus disappeared and another Laxus appeared...
Then the battle we were watching between Laxus and Alexei was just an illusion?!
So we could not see it, but he was under attack by five people...
On top of that, the master participated in the tournament...
Any way you look at it, that is a breach of the rules.
That guy wiped out all of the Raven Tail members by himself?!
First, there was Erza, then Cana...
It is like he got payback for me...
Why does he get to steal all the glory?!
I just hope that Flare girl is not abused again.
You really are a nice person...
Lumen Histoire is Fairy Tail's darkness.
You people are coming with us as well.
After some consultation, it is been decided that Raven Tail is disqualified!
And they are banned from participating in the tournament for three years.
Well, that result was an embarrassment,
but let us move on to our fourth match, the last match of the day-kabo!
From Fairy Tail A, Wendy Marvel!
Versus Cheria Blendy of Lamia Scale!
It looks like they do not know Cheria's strength yet.
I can just picture the look of surprise on Gray's face.
That is not the face I see...
Laxus got revenge for my sock!
If you lose, you are going to spin.
Alright, the moment you have been waiting for!
Both contestants are taking the field-kabo!
Is that girl going to be okay?
To me, it looks like she is got magic and motivation in spades!
Knowing Wendy, I am sure she will be fine!
I can tell even from here...
She is improved enormously compared to seven years ago.
This is sure to be an incredibly cute showdown!
You felt that, did not you?!
Alright, the final match of day three!
See Cheria's ability and be stunned, Gray.
Was that girl in Fairy Tail?
I only know a little about her,
but she is a very courageous wizard.
After all my training, I have to do my best here!
Wing Slash of the Sky Dragon!
North wind, become the breath of the gods and blow on the land!
Bore through the ground and make it dance up to the sky!
That will be in my dreams!
So that guy was not the only one...
That one guy from Grimoire, Shinpachiro or something...
Did not he say it was Zancrow?
He used God Slayer Magic too?
Nah, it was not that big a deal!
No matter who her opponent is, right now, Wendy has to face her on her own.
This is Wendy's moment of truth.
I heard about you from Lyon.
He said there was a girl in Fairy Tail who can use the same magic as me.
Maybe I was a little too rough?
Since we are here, let us have more fun, okay?
but I will do my best for the guild!
I will do my best for love and the guild, too!
To the eye, they are as cute as can be, but both of them are impressive wizards!
Two wizards, both wielding Wind Magic,
but is Cheria-tan one rank higher?!
Strictly speaking, it is Sky Magic.
Elfman-san said the rest is up to me!
I do not like to fight,
but when I have to fight for the sake of the guild...
Then I will do it, too!
Who would have expected Cheria to eat air during a battle?
Does that mean she recognizes her opponent as worthy?
If you do not, you will lose a sock!
And socks have nothing to do with it.
W-What are Wendy-tan and Cheria-tan doing?!
Is it my imagination or has the oxygen thinned out a bit?
Has she already mastered them both?!
She is as good as won.
I have not mastered Milky Way yet...
The winner, from Fairy Tail A...
Whereas Wendy cannot heal herself, with Sky God Slayer Magic you can.
Sorry, but she has no chance of winning this.
What kind of girl is she?!
To keep a secret like this...
Even though I told her to give it her all...
She is far stronger than you!
Do not tell me that girl is mixed up with Zeref...
At this rate, Wendy will be in grave danger!
I have a feeling Wendy and Cheria's cuteness ranking will go up after this match.
Certainly, people are gettin' pumped up about this in a weird way.
Even though I am younger, smaller, and most importantly, cuter than them both!
Yeah, well, what difference does it make...?
There are some fights that I am not willing to just let go!
And exactly what are you fighting against?
This world, where everyone makes a fuss only over people that stand out!
